metadata.synopsis: Flaming Fist Aubree is devoted to the Ravengard but also pragmatic. She's unafraid of asking for the player's help and is concerned for Ravengard. Does her best to look at things in a non-judgemental way.

0.speaker: Fist Aubree
0.text: I've heard the stories about Moonrise. I hope the Duke is all right.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: concerned

1.speaker: Fist Aubree
1.text: Marcus was scum. But the rest of us are loyal to Duke Ravengard, loyal to Baldur's Gate, I swear it.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: worried the player thinks less of the flaming fist

2.speaker: Fist Aubree
2.text: An extra blade could be the difference between rescuing Duke Ravengard or losing him forever. I hope you'll help us.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Sincere

3.speaker: Fist Aubree
3.text: Duke Ravengard is more than our leader, he's family. I can't believe one of us would betray him.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: you can't believe someone could even THINK of betraying your organisation - it's everything to you
